TopicTitle: If you were the first person on mars, what would you say?

Articles.Content: "I would like to thank SQUAD for developing Kerbal Space Program, which inspired me to venture beyond my homeworld."
"A expensive boot touches mars for taxpayers delight."
"IN YOUR FACE, NEIL ARMSTRONG!!!"
"Wow, this set is very realistic, they even managed to find a way to increase the gravity, Anyway can we start recording? It's cold here on Pluto, wait we're already recording? Fudge...."

"...this isn't my living-room."

I don't work for NASA and I'm not an astronaut.
"Hang on, let me run a speed test on the Internet."
8 months for this? Turn on the engines we're going home now. I have some words for NASA.

"Are we there yet?"

*Steps onto Mars*
*YAWN* - "Ahhhh Friday! ....What do you mean "Thursday"? AUGH! Next you'll be telling me this isn't even Earth!"

"Alright, so we screwed up in the attempt to fake a Mars landing on Pluto and had to wipe everyone's memory, hopefully thing's will go better here on Venus, You guy's started recording yet? Oh... not again..."
Joke's on you, moon-landing believers, this is a soundstage ON MARS!
I could really go for a real meal for a change.  All of this bagged food...
Where are dem rovers? i want them!

"Landing on the moon, pft, piece of cake"

the_pazter, first man on mars, sometime in the future

Edited April 16, 2016 by the_pazter

So here we are in area fifty onIMEAN MARS here to plant this flag in honor of the illuminatEARTH to try and find aliens WHO WE TOTALLY DON'T ALREADY KNOW SUCH AS PRESIDENT LIZARD and- what?

*exotic gurgles and screeches are heard behind the camera*

 

What do you mean, it's not good enough! I'm sure the sheeple still have no idea!

That's one small step fo-- HOLY **** IT'S GOT SOME KIND OF DRILL GET BACK TO THE...[unintelligible]...[signal lost]

In reference to this xkcd:
"... Dang it.  I forgot to take the lense cap off.  Start over."

I declare independence

Then id go back to the space craft sign a constitution.
We're here! Get out the potatoes Mark!

*starring at the sky* ; hum ; seen from here that's full moon everyday on earth

Edited April 23, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
@theclaw
Mark! Get the potatoes out! And make sure the MAV won't tip! And check for storms!

"Oh God! Feels sooo good to finally stretch my legs! That trip felt like it took months! Wheres the bathroom?"

Or

"It was the courage and committment of all human kind that brought this man to Mars. I take this step for all mankind and pray its a step toward unity and peace for our race. Thank you, citizens of my home, Planet Earth, for this amazing opportunity. We made it."

Or

"I have successfully contaminated Mars, Houston. Mission accomplished."
"Where is Sojourner, I've always wanted to hug it" (seriously though, this thing is so cute)
Your avatar is so cute.
"Whoa, check it out! There's life on Mars!" *points to crewmates*
